questions.question: Which of following is an alloy of Aluminium?

explanations.a: Kryron is not a recognized aluminum alloy.
explanations.b: Rose metal is an alloy of bismuth, lead, and tin.
explanations.c: Megallium is an aluminum-based alloy. More info
explanations.d: Cerrosafe is a low-melting alloy containing bismuth, not aluminum.

questions.question: In an alloy, if the primary constituents are a metal, then it is called ______.

explanations.a: Ternary alloy refers to an alloy with three elements.
explanations.b: Correct. A base metal alloy has a metal as its primary constituent.
explanations.c: Binary alloy refers to an alloy with two components, not necessarily metallic.
explanations.d: System is a general term, not specific to composition.

questions.question: Copper is separated from brass by precipitating it as....

explanations.a: CuCN is not used in this procedure.
explanations.b: CuSO₄ is soluble and not used for gravimetric estimation.
explanations.c: CuCl₂ is also soluble and not used for precipitation.
explanations.d: Copper is precipitated as CuSCN (Copper(I) thiocyanate). More details
